title: Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Civil Rights Digital Storytelling- On-Line Materials for Educators Learn more about the diverse stories of the civil rights movement found through personal narratives of civil rights leaders. These narratives were completed by members of Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc., the Association for the Study of African American Life and History, Howard University Students and National Park Service rangers. They are available at http://www.schooltube.com/channel/npsedu/.
